us.label: Who We Are?
us.title: The Perfect Partner for Your Project
us.description1: We are more than a supplier: we are your trusted partner in driving your construction projects to success.
us.description2: Specialized in concrete equipment, we offer complete solutions, from research and development to manufacturing, with local after-sales service.
us.description3: Our machines, designed to the strictest European standards, guarantee quality, performance, and safety.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Building the Future, Together
mission.description: Our mission is to provide innovative and high-quality construction solutions while empowering our team to create lasting value.

stats.label: Integrity
stats.text: We act with honesty and transparency, honoring every commitment made to our clients and partners.

stats.label: Innovation
stats.text: We evolve with the times, constantly seeking modern solutions to address tomorrow’s challenges.

stats.label: Excellence
stats.text: We aim for perfection in the quality of our products and services, without compromise.

stats.label: Collaboration
stats.text: We believe in the power of teamwork, sharing success with our clients and partners.

dna.label: Who We Are?
dna.title: Our DNA
dna.description1: We are more than a supplier: we are your trusted partner in driving your construction projects to success.
dna.description2: Specialized in concrete equipment, we offer complete solutions, from research and development to manufacturing, with local after-sales service.
dna.description3: Our machines, designed to the strictest European standards, guarantee quality, performance, and safety.

tabs.title: Research and Development
tabs.description: While creativity must flourish without constraints, producing a finished product requires rigor and discipline. That’s why we’ve strengthened our Research & Development department and invested in cutting-edge tools to ensure the viability of our ideas. Our unique European Testing Center embodies this commitment, allowing us to subject each component to rigorous testing.

tabs.title: Smartronic™
tabs.description: FENNEC’s Smartronic™ system is an electronic breakthrough that enhances the performance and safety of truck-mounted pumps and mixer pumps. It simplifies machine management with an intuitive interface and centralizes critical data for real-time monitoring of main components. Smartronic™ autonomously regulates the pumping unit, pressure, and engine speed, ensuring optimal efficiency and reliability.

tabs.title: Carbotech
tabs.description: Since 2010, FENNEC has equipped its high-end truck-mounted pumps and mixer pumps with carbon fiber. This composite material, lighter than steel and easily repairable, offers remarkable performance. By applying it to the arm’s terminal sections, we improve machine stability while reducing overall weight.

stats.title: A complete solution for your construction projects

after_sale.label: After-Sale Service
after_sale.title: A Team of Experts at Your Service
after_sale.description: Our commitment doesn’t end with equipment delivery. We offer responsive and professional assistance and original spare parts to ensure the performance and longevity of your machines.

replacement_pieces.label: Spare Parts
replacement_pieces.title: Original Parts, Within Reach
replacement_pieces.description: Our original spare parts guarantee the reliability and durability of your Fennec equipment. We ensure fast availability and competitive service to meet your needs.

leasing.title: Leasing
leasing.description: Find out about our equipment leasing options.

contact.title: Contact Us for a Tailored Plan
contact.description: Speak to one of our experts to explore leasing and financing options that meet your needs. Together, we’ll find the ideal solution to equip your projects efficiently and confidently.

financement.label: Leasing and Financing
financement.title: Equip Yourself Today
financement.description: With our leasing and financing solutions, you gain optimal flexibility to equip your sites while preserving liquidity for other priorities.
